about_the_game:
You play as a guy whose name is not given. All that is known about him is that he is a sex-crazed maniac and fucks his couch. He kidnaps a girl on the street and locks her in a bunker he built in the basement of his house. He starts fucking her wherever he can. He has sex with her every day. He couldn't even dream of this, because before he met this girl he was still a virgin. She was his first girlfriend and it brought him great joy. But Ashley herself was extremely unpleasant, and she dreamed of running away. An ingenious plan to escape from the hated bunker matured in her mind.....

Key Features:

A vivid protagonist: Maniac was inspired by a real-life psychopath whose personality and behavior became the basis for his character.
Deep narrative: Immerse yourself in an intriguing story full of unexpected twists and secrets.
High-quality animation: Enjoy detailed and high-quality animations of sex.
Cool soundtrack: Discover the atmosphere of the game with an emotionally rich soundtrack.

content_descriptors.notes:
WARNING!
This game is for ADULTS only and contains sexually explicit material that some viewers may find offensive. The game contains sexual violence, sexual relations without consent, bondage and BDSM. All characters shown in the game are over 18 years old.

short_description: Sex Slave Of The Bunker is a first-person adventure game in which you play the role of a sex maniac who kidnaps and locks a girl named Ashley in a bunker. In this bunker, he fucks her in all her slits. Naturally, everything happens against her will.
